name: Escaping Covid
description:
Theme: Running out of space
PC x64 Required: Left Click -- ENTER -- WASD or SPACE/ARROW KEYS

+ You are running out of space that COVID-19 hasn't taken from you.

+ You are on the run, collecting Syringes to end the madness.

+ You will encounter coughing people that you can sneeze back on, large COVID-19 particles (made with Houdini), and tiny particles that just get in the way.

+ All of the movies, malls, and open areas are closed...you're running out of space so just keep running or collect enough vaccine syringes and things might be ok!

This is my first solo Unreal 4.26 game. I hope you like it.

You can press ENTER to keep going past 50 when you get really good at the game ;)
